software_issues.title: Application Not Responding
software_issues.description: Software becomes unresponsive and stops accepting user input
symptoms: Program window becomes white or gray
software_issues.prevention: Regularly close unused applications and restart system weekly

software_issues.title: Software Won't Install
software_issues.description: Installation process fails or encounters errors during setup
symptoms: Setup process stops at specific percentage

solutions.action: Run installer as administrator (right-click > Run as administrator)
Clear temporary files and restart system
Download fresh copy of installer from official source

software_issues.prevention: Download software only from official sources and keep system updated

software_issues.title: Frequent Software Crashes
software_issues.description: Application unexpectedly closes or terminates during normal operation
symptoms: Error dialog boxes appear before closure
Windows Event Viewer shows application errors

solutions.action: Update to latest version of software
Check system requirements and available RAM

software_issues.prevention: Maintain adequate free disk space and RAM for applications

maintenance_tips: Keep software updated to latest versions
Regularly clear temporary files and cache
Create system restore points before major changes
Monitor system resources during heavy usage

common_error_codes.0x8007000E: Out of memory - close other applications
